outputs.output_descr: The project strategy is specifically directed toward supporting the Government in meeting its obligation towards the UN Convention on Biodiversity as well as supporting the implementation of the Law on Nature Protection. The project aims to develop the institutional and systemic capacity of the country's protected area agencies to: (i) strengthen the national knowledge systems, and apply appropriate technologies, to support the design and development of a more representative and viable protected areas network; (ii) strengthen the decision-support tools needed to secure the legal tenure of, and expand, the protected areas in the network; and (iii) locally test these decision-support tools and mechanisms in the formal re-proclamation processes in al least two pilot protected areas.

project_descr: Strengthening the Ecological, Institutional and Financial Sustainability of FYR Macedonia's Protected Area System
